page.title: 12CLAVERING PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: At Clavering School we do many things. For normal school work we do Fletcher Maths, Mainline English and Fractions. For good work we get teampoints. The teams are Griffin, Pegasus, Unicorn, and Centaur each with a captain and vice-captain. Every month the team with most points receives a trophy. We have assemblies every day except Tuesdays. There are ten teachers including Mr. Russell the head teacher and Mr.Ward the deputy head who is my teacher. Each year we have a Sports Day, Summer Fair and Christmas Pantomime. We also have several concerts which include our orchestra and choir. The orchestra has about thirty members playing recorders, woodwind, strings, brass and percussion. I play'cello. On Sports Day we all enter races and try to win points for our team.
